name: Shockwave.
description:
One player pong spin-off, click play or tap on mobile to start game. tap/click to spawn shockwaves and your score is the time the ball is inside the playing field. 

NOTE: pressing quit does not do anything because itch does not like Godot.

 I never got around to making the ball start moving instantly so you have to click manually. 

Game has weird physics.
